statements: SELECT * FROM edge_device_settings ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, setting_name FROM edge_device_settings WHERE setting_value = 'on'
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM edge_device_settings WHERE device_id = '123456'
SELECT * FROM edge_device_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%temperature%'
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM edge_device_settings ORDER BY setting_name ASC
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value, last_updated FROM edge_device_settings WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM edge_device_settings WHERE setting_name = 'temperature_limit'
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value, last_updated FROM edge_device_settings ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value, last_updated FROM edge_device_settings WHERE setting_name IN ('temperature_limit', 'humidity_limit')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_settings FROM edge_device_settings
SELECT * FROM edge_devices_settings;
SELECT device_id, setting_name FROM edge_devices_settings WHERE setting_value = 'value';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM edge_devices_settings ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_settings_history WHERE setting_name LIKE 'name%';
SELECT device_id, MAX(change_timestamp) AS latest_change FROM device_settings_history GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM edge_devices_settings WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM edge_devices_settings WHERE setting_name = 'power';
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM edge_devices_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%config%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT setting_name FROM edge_devices_settings WHERE setting_value = 'on';
SELECT device_id, setting_name, change_timestamp FROM device_settings_history WHERE change_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EdgeDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM EdgeDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM EdgeDevices JOIN DeviceSettings ON EdgeDevices.device_id = DeviceSettings.device_id;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM DeviceLogs WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EdgeDevices;
SELECT * FROM EdgeDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM EdgeDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM EdgeDevices JOIN DeviceSettings ON EdgeDevices.device_id = DeviceSettings.device_id;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM DeviceLogs WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM EdgeDevices JOIN DeviceLogs ON EdgeDevices.device_id = DeviceLogs.device_id WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EdgeDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM EdgeDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT type_name, type_description FROM DeviceTypes ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM ConfigurationSettings WHERE setting_id <= 5;
SELECT device_id, connected_device_id FROM DeviceConnections WHERE connection_type = 'wifi';
SELECT * FROM EdgeDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM EdgeDevices WHERE device_id = 3;

SELECT d.device_name, dt.type_name, cs.setting_name FROM EdgeDevices AS d INNER JOIN DeviceTypes AS dt ON d.device_id = dt.type_id LEFT JOIN ConfigurationSettings AS cs ON d.device_id = cs.setting_id;
SELECT * FROM DeviceConnections WHERE connection_type = 'wifi' ORDER BY connected_device_id, device_id;

SELECT d.device_name, dc.connection_type, dt.type_name FROM EdgeDevices AS d INNER JOIN DeviceConnections AS dc ON d.device_id = dc.device_id INNER JOIN DeviceTypes AS dt ON d.device_id = dt.type_id WHERE dc.connected_device_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM device_configuration;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_configuration ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(device_id) AS num_devices FROM device_configuration_mapping JOIN device_group ON device_group.group_id = device_configuration_mapping.device_id GROUP BY group_name;

SELECT device_id, device_name, configuration_settings->>'parameter_name' AS parameter_name FROM device_configuration JOIN configuration_parameters ON configuration_parameters.parameter_id = device_configuration.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, type_name FROM device_configuration LEFT JOIN device_type ON device_configuration.device_id = device_type.type_id;
SELECT device_name, configuration_settings FROM device_configuration WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT type_name FROM device_type WHERE type_id = 2;
SELECT group_name FROM device_group WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT parameter_name, default_value FROM configuration_parameters WHERE data_type = 'integer';
SELECT device_name, configuration_settings, group_name FROM device_configuration JOIN device_group ON device_configuration.device_id = device_group.group_id;
